verses.verse: <S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> you are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>great;<s%> you are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1935>honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty.<s%>
Who <S%H5844>cover<s%> yourself with <S%H216>light<s%> as with a <S%H8008>garment:<s%> who <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> like a <S%H3407>curtain:<s%>

Who <S%H7760>lays<s%> the <S%H7136>beams<s%> of his <S%H5944>chambers<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> who <S%H7760>makes<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> his <S%H7398>chariot:<s%> who <S%H1980>walks<s%> on the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind:<s%>
Who <S%H6213>makes<s%> his <S%H4397>angels<s%> <S%H7307>spirits;<s%> his <S%H8334>ministers<s%> a <S%H3857>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire:<s%>
Who laid the <S%H4349>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that it should not be <S%H4131>removed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%> <S%H5703><s%>
You <S%H3680>covered<s%> it with the <S%H8415>deep<s%> as with a <S%H3830>garment:<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
<S%H4480>At<s%> your <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> they <S%H5127>fled;<s%> <S%H4480>at<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H7482>thunder<s%> they <S%H2648>hurried<s%> away.

They <S%H5927>go<s%> up by the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> they <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> by the <S%H1237>valleys<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H2088>which<s%> you have <S%H3245>founded<s%> for them.
You have <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H1366>bound<s%> that they may not <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over;<s%> that they <S%H7725>turn<s%> not <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sends<s%> the <S%H4599>springs<s%> into the <S%H5158>valleys,<s%> which <S%H1980>run<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H2022>hills.<s%>
They give <S%H8248>drink<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field:<s%> the <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>asses<s%> <S%H7665>quench<s%> their <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>
By them shall the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> have their <S%H7931>habitation,<s%> which <S%H5414>sing<s%> <S%H6963><s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H6073>branches.<s%>
He <S%H8248>waters<s%> the <S%H2022>hills<s%> from his <S%H5944>chambers:<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H4639>works.<s%>

He causes the <S%H2682>grass<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> for the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and <S%H6212>herb<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H120>man:<s%> that he may <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

And <S%H3196>wine<s%> that makes <S%H8056>glad<s%> the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H582>man,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> to make his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6670>shine,<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> which <S%H5582>strengthens<s%> <S%H582>man's<s%> <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
The <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H7654>full<s%> of sap; the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H5193>planted;<s%>
<S%H834>Where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H6833>birds<s%> make their <S%H7077>nests:<s%> as for the <S%H2624>stork,<s%> the <S%H1265>fir<s%> trees are her <S%H1004>house.<s%>
The <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>hills<s%> are a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for the <S%H3277>wild<s%> <S%H3277>goats;<s%> and the <S%H5553>rocks<s%> for the <S%H8227>conies.<s%>
He <S%H6213>appointed<s%> the <S%H3394>moon<s%> for <S%H4150>seasons:<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> his <S%H3996>going<s%> down.
You <S%H7896>make<s%> <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and it is <S%H3915>night:<s%> wherein <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> do <S%H7430>creep<s%> forth.
The <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions<s%> <S%H7580>roar<s%> after their <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H400>meat<s%> from <S%H410>God.<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rises,<s%> they <S%H622>gather<s%> themselves together, and <S%H7257>lay<s%> them <S%H7257>down<s%> in their <S%H4585>dens.<s%>
<S%H120>Man<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to his <S%H6467>work<s%> and to his <S%H5656>labor<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H7231>manifold<s%> are your <S%H4639>works!<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> have you <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H3605>all:<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of your <S%H7075>riches.<s%>

So is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7342>wide<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H8033>wherein<s%> are things <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7342>innumerable,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2416>beasts.<s%>
<S%H8033>There<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> the <S%H591>ships:<s%> there is that <S%H3882>leviathan,<s%> whom you have <S%H3335>made<s%> to <S%H7832>play<s%> therein.
These <S%H7663>wait<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> on you; that you may <S%H5414>give<s%> them their <S%H400>meat<s%> in due <S%H6256>season.<s%>
That you <S%H5414>give<s%> them they <S%H3950>gather:<s%> you <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> they are <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H2896>good.<s%>

You <S%H5641>hide<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> they are <S%H926>troubled:<s%> you <S%H622>take<s%> away their <S%H7307>breath,<s%> they <S%H1478>die,<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to their <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
You <S%H7971>send<s%> forth your <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> they are <S%H1254>created:<s%> and you <S%H2318>renew<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>endure<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H4639>works.<s%>
He <S%H5027>looks<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H7460>trembles:<s%> he <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H2022>hills,<s%> and they <S%H6225>smoke.<s%>
I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> as <S%H5704>long<s%> as I <S%H2416>live:<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5750>while<s%> I have my <S%H5750>being.<s%>
My <S%H7879>meditation<s%> of him shall be <S%H6149>sweet:<s%> I will be <S%H8056>glad<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Let the <S%H2400>sinners<s%> be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%>
